name: Digital Technology Platformer Game (uncomplete)
description:
After learning about how to make games in Unity for months this is my first ever game. It is currently in an unfinished state but is a good example of what it is going to be like when finished (there is likely to be many bugs).

Controls:

Jump: space

left and right: arrow keys or A and D

Sprint: Shift

Escape key for pause menu.
